name: Last Wishes
description:
This is a gameplay preview [demo] of the upcoming game, Last Wishes, created on RPG Maker VX ACE.

A story of life and its unpredictable nature.

Hope is a cheerful girl living an average life, until one day she is suddenly diagnosed with a terminal illness. With no cure available, her mother, Laura devotes her time to completing her daughter’s last wishes before the illness takes her life. During this time, Hope will meet new people whom may become her friends, enemies, or nothing at all.

Your choices matter

Everything is optional, but all the choices you make affect the story and minds of the characters. Some may die, some may live. 

Custom Art

Many characters are brought to life with custom portraits and an abundant amount of CGs to capture the emotions of scenes.

Side Quests

Enjoy many quirky side quests that can affect the story, as you help Hope complete her final wishes.
